attributes.action: protect the interests of Bradford and Bingley shareholders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The interests of shareholders should be protected by H.M.Government following the collapse of Bradford and Bingley building society,a huge number of whom will prove to be small shareholders who can ill afford to lose their life savings in times of recession and rising inflation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
